__e: Dude, you didn't tell me there was macaroni and cheese.
There aren't enough cheesy noodles in the universe to fix all that, I'm afraid.
Well, If I'm a chicken wing then you're a can of chicken noodle soup.
You can't overpower a girl like that with two noodles for arms. It's laughable.
You guys, she made me make the noodles from scratch.
Try to imagine... what it's like to deliver one bowl of noodles to an office that's right above the restaurant!
Do you know what it's like to play all those crappy street fairs, live on nothing but ramen noodles, sleep in a van for 14 months?
There's this restaurant in Chinatown supposed to have the best noodles in the city.
Will I boil the newspaper and prepare noodles of it? !
